pages.title: Dark Metal
pages.text: After some experiments you noticed that pieces of darkness react wonderfully with gold. By tempering the noble metal you created something new with unheard-of strength.
Thanks to the malleability of gold you can obtain two dark ingots at once. The downside is how many pieces of darkness the process consumes.
Even so, the ore already contains traces of gold, so a simple smelt yields the same ingot, though only one.$(br2)Like any metal, dark ingots can be compacted into blocks for storage.
